body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.  Create a 100 card deck and save it
2.  Attempt to load same deck on different play attempt What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Game immediatley crashes upon attempt to load the deck.  Decks with 100 cards or more in them cannot be edited. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.28 on Windows XP. If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
